article: Dear Lee, Thank you for your note I like your _ between death and failure I had not thought of these two in the same way _ you describe I thank you for bringing this to my _ Your insights are very deep As you say, death is only a n _ but failure can change someone s whole life Yes, death is final Failure is _ Death leaves us with _ But failure can leave us with lessons which will _ our lives I hope that your failure to pass that _ English test will help you _ it will hurt you Please remember that it is not being _ down that is important It is the inability to get up that is _ You will have to learn to get up, and to get going Failure is the staying down It is not the falling down From reading your letter, I _ your English to be very good You write better than _ of my American friends I do not know the reason for _ your English test Maybe you were distracted that day It is _ that persons are judged on the basis of a single test You write well, you _ your feelings with excellence, and you think _ These characteristics should _ you move toward a bright career Just don t let yourself stay down Get up and _ them all know that you are talented and you are _ to succeed I think you will With best wishes for a fine career Yours,Frank26
